field.name: Edema of the feet and hands, face, or ankles | Take Action
Refer client to a health center or hospital IMMEDIATELY
Record clinical information in client’s maternal health or “Red” book if she has one. If possible, fill out referral form
Accompany client and have a family member accompany client to the health facility
Follow up with client after discharge from health center or hospital
